47T.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47T.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as long term equity funds/retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, cancer, personal accident, car, and travel insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction services, hire purchase and retail loan, SME lending, and insurance brokerage services. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

79PA.SG.summary: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance services in Thailand. The company offers hire purchase and loan, and non-performing assets management services. It also invests in other companies; and provides management and consulting services for retail credit systems in local and foreign country, as well as credit sale in foreign country. In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

7TWN.SG.summary: Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Securities and Derivatives Business; and Financial Advisory Business and Investment Banking. The company is involved in the broking, trading, borrowing and lending, and underwriting of securities. It also provides investment advisory, private fund asset management, and financial advisory services, as well as operates as a derivatives agent. In addition, the company invests in other companies and listed companies. As of December 31, 2019, it had 7 branches. Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACAP-R.BK.long_name: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited
ACAP-R.BK.summary: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited provides corporate and retail lending services in Thailand and the Asian region. The company operates through Lending and Factoring, Call Center Services and Financial Businesses, and Others segments. It also provides non-performing loan servicing on behalf of client creditors, such as front end customer services to borrowers and carrying out day to day administration and accounting of the recovery process, loans accounts, and asset collateral, as well as NPL portfolio valuation services. In addition, the company offers legal advisory and representation services in the areas of business law, real estate law, civil law, bankruptcy law, tax law, and public sector relations; factoring services; and business process outsourcing services comprising call center, debt and receivables collection, loan approval, payroll, and data entry services. Further, it is involved in the sale of land with buildings and other real estate; and provision of investment banking services. The company was formerly known as ACAP Advisory Public Company Limited and changed its name to ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited in February 2016. ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AE3.SG.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AE3.SG.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEC-R.BK.summary: AEC Securities Public Company Limited provides securities trading and investment advisory services in Thailand. It offers securities brokerage services comprises various securities trading account, such as cash account, cash balance account, and credit balance account; derivatives brokerage; electronic/internet trading; investment banking, which includes financial advisory, mergers and acquisitions, initial public offerings, real estate investment trust (REIT)/infrastructure fund, debt restructuring, corporate structuring, and capital restructuring services; mutual funds; securities borrowing and lending; manages private funds; and AIPRO trading system, an investment services in security exchange with the program trading system. The company was formerly known as United Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to AEC Securities Public Company Limited in June 2013. AEC Securities Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AF-R.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, major public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. In addition, the company provides hire purchase, finance lease, and operating lease for industrial equipment and machines; and private fund, mutual fund management, and securities brokerage of investment units services, Further, it engages in receivable factoring, venture capital, property development, and asset management businesses. AIRA Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company was formerly known as Nava Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited in October 2010. ASK-R.BK.long_name: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited
ASK-R.BK.summary: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited provides auto hire purchase services primarily in Thailand. It operates through five segments: Hire Purchase, Leasing, Loan, Factoring, and Insurance Broker. The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chailease Holding Company Limited.

ASP-R.BK.summary: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates in four segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, Fund Management, and Investment Trading. The company provides securities and derivatives brokering services for local and foreign investors; financial advisory and underwriting services; and fund management services. It also invests in unit trusts; and buys, sells, and exchanges securities. The company was formerly known as Asia Plus Group Holdings Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited in July 2015. AYUD-R.BK.long_name: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited
AYUD-R.BK.summary: Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Non-life Insurance Business and Investment Business. It offers fire, marine, motor, transportation, travel accident, and miscellaneous insurance products, as well as reinsurance products. The company was formerly known as Sri Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited and changed its name to Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited in April 2019. Allianz Ayudhya Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Pathumwan, Thailand.

BAM-R.BK.long_name: Bangkok Commercial Asset Management Company Limited
BAM-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Commercial Asset Management Company Limited operates as an asset management company. It purchases NPLs from financial institutions in Thailand, including banks and other asset management companies; and manage NPLs through debt restructuring negotiations with debtors to reach optimal solutions for all stakeholders where possible. The company also acquires NPAs through various means, such as negotiating with debtors for the transfer of the underlying collateral in satisfaction of debt, foreclosing on the collateral underlying our NPLs, and purchasing NPAs directly from financial institutions. Its NPLs are primarily collateralized by real estate properties, secured by a first priority mortgage; and NPAs are primarily real estate assets, such as undeveloped landbanks, hotels, commercial properties, and certain movable assets and securities, as well as residential properties, including detached houses, townhouses, and condominiums. Bangkok Commercial Asset Management Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BAY-R.BK.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
BAY-R.BK.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 690 branches in Thailand; 2 branches in Vientiane and Savannakhet Lao PDR; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,750 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

BBL-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Domestic Banking, International Banking, Investment Banking, and Others segments. It offers various personal banking products and services, including savings, current, fixed deposit, foreign currency, and other accounts; home, collateral, overdraft, and personal loans; mutual funds; investments products and services, such as bills of exchange, and bonds and debentures, as well as securities brokerage services; life and non-life bancassurance products; payment, funds transfer, currency exchange, and SMS services; debit, credit, purchasing, and prepaid cards; and phone and Internet banking, mobile banking, ATMs, and other services. The company also provides business banking products and services comprising operating accounts; international trade, investment banking, and e-guarantee services; securities services, such as custodian, mutual fund supervisor, provident fund registrar, securities registrar, and debenture holders' representative services; cash management, investment, merchant, and online banking services; corporate financing services; and payment, merchant, and commercial cards. In addition, it offers trade finance, remittances, fund transfer, export and import, project, corporate finance, insurance, and advisory services, as well as liquidity, fund, and asset management services. As of December 31,2019, the company operated through a network of 1,148 branches in Thailand; and 31 branches in Cambodia, China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, the Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam. Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also provides commercial lending and project finance services that comprise commercial loan facilities, such as loans for working capital with various short-term maturities and/or loans to finance inventory or receivables; medium and long term loan facilities to finance expansion or capital expenditures; and aval and guarantee facilities. In addition, the company provides debenture holder representative services; and invests in securities, such as common shares, government bonds, state enterprise bonds, corporate debentures, bills of exchange, etc. in primary and secondary markets. The company was formerly known as Bangkok First Investment & Trust Public Company Limited. Srisawad Finance Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

BLA-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides life insurance services to individuals and corporates in Thailand. Its life insurance products include income protection, savings and investments, education, pension, accident plans, total permanent disability, and health and critical illness products. The company also provides general insurance products comprise personal insurance and business all risks insurance products, including fire, motor, burglary, personal accident, accident and personal health, travel accident, cancer, golfer's indemnity, home multicover, medical malpractice liability, bail bond, business interruption, marine, hull, workmen's compensation, money, contractors' plant and equipment, contractors' all risks, erection all risks, boiler and pressure vessel, electronic equipment, industrial all risks, public liability, neon-sign, plate glass fidelity guarantee, group accident and health, group accident, and shop multicover insurance products. In addition, it offers bancassurance products; equity, long term equity, mixed, foreign investment, fixed income, exchange traded, money market, local fixed income, and retirement mutual funds; and home loans, such as Bla home plans. Further, the company provides insurance brokerage services. Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CGH-R.BK.summary: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the securities business in Thailand. Further, it offers corporate banking, multi-currency cash management, trade financing, transaction banking, and treasury services; and new instruments comprising convertible debenture, warrants and options, and derivative products. In addition, the company provides securities trading, borrowing, and lending; securities and derivatives brokerage; underwriting; and wealth management services. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 35 branches in Bangkok and upcountry. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Maybank Kim Eng Holdings Limited.

MFC-R.BK.long_name: MFC Asset Management Public Company Limited
MFC-R.BK.summary: MFC Asset Management Public Company Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm manages mutual funds for its clients. It also manages provident funds for its clients. The firm invests in public equity and fixed income markets of the world. It also invests in industrial property. The firm deals in acquiring and leasing the property. It includes freehold and leasehold, ownership and freehold rights of land and factories. The firm conducts in-house research to make its investments. MFC Asset Management Public Company Limited was previously known as The Mutual Fund Public Company Limited. MFC Asset Management Public Company Limited was founded on 14 March 1975, and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MIDA-R.BK.summary: Mida Assets Public Company Limited engages in the sale and hire-purchase of electronic home appliances, motorcycles, and used cars in Thailand. The company also develops real estate properties; operates hotels; rents golf courses; and provides real estate agency services. In addition, it offers advertising, billboard rental, and advertising sale services; public relation and events organizing services; financial services for used cars; and security guard services. Further, the company is involved in asset management; the management of hotels, resorts, commercial buildings, condominiums, villages, and spas; and the provision of health massage. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 98 branches. The company was formerly known as Nakornpathom Mida 1991 and changed its name to Mida Assets Public Company Limited in 1997. Mida Assets Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ML-R.BK.summary: Mida Leasing Public Company Limited provides financial services for used cars hire-purchasing and management of non-performing assets in Thailand. The company, through its subsidiary, Mida Asset Management Company Limited, also engages in asset management from transferred non-performing asset of financial institutions. It also provides other financial services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 17 branches in Bangkok and other provinces. Mida Leasing Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MTC-R.BK.summary: Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited provides various lending services in Thailand. The company offers loans that are secured against vehicle registrations, land title deeds loans, condominium loans, and Nano finance, as well as personal loans without collateral. It also provides car, motorcycles, and agricultural truck loans. In addition, the company offers insurance brokerage services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 4,107 branches and service centers. The company was formerly known as Muangthai Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited in April 2018. Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MTI-R.BK.long_name: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited
MTI-R.BK.summary: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products and services in Thailand. The company offers motor insurance; and non-motor products that include property, marine and transportation, engineering, personal accident and health, special products, liability, and miscellaneous insurance products, as well as travel and commercial insurance products. It also invests in various securities, as well as engages in reinsurance business. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NCAP-R.BK.summary: Next Capital Public Company Limited provides motorcycle hire purchase loans primarily to small customers in Thailand. The company also provides second hand car hire purchase services; services in connection with the provision of credit services as an additional service to customers, including motorcycle registration services with the Department of Land Transport; and coordination services for insurance, including the right transfer. It serves direct customers and motorcycle dealers. The company was formerly known as Buff (Thailand) Company Limited. Next Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company was formerly known as Luang Lee Insurance Company Limited and changed its name to The Navakij Insurance Public Company Limited in 1985. NSI-R.BK.long_name: Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited
NSI-R.BK.summary: Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Motor Insurance and Others Insurance. The company offers fire insurance; motor insurance comprising compulsory and voluntary insurance; marine and transportation insurance that provides coverage for losses and damages to hull and the transported cargo; and miscellaneous insurance products covering burglary, public-liability, contract-work, golfer's indemnity, etc. It is also involved in the reinsurance business; and investing in financial instruments, including bonds and others. The company operates 26 sub-branches in Bangkok. Nam Seng Insurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAK.F.summary: Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Thailand. It operates through six segments: Company, Banking Business, Asset Management Business, Securities Business, Life Insurance Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company offers commercial banking and asset management, securities brokerage and analysis, proprietary trading, securities borrowing and lending, and investment and financial advisory services, as well as operates as an underwriter and securities registrar. It also provides mutual fund, private fund, and provident fund management services; life and health insurance to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations;  fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous insurance products; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and leasing service for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAU.F.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
NVAU.F.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 690 branches in Thailand; 2 branches in Vientiane and Savannakhet Lao PDR; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,750 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

NVPB.F.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
NVPB.F.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Treasury and Investment. It provides various retail banking products and services, including current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts; time and foreign currency deposits; personal and housing loans; debit, travel, cash and top up, and credit cards; investment services; travel, motor, and home asset insurance products; money transfer, payment and top up, foreign exchange, and overseas education services; and e-banking services. The company also offers SME loans for small and medium businesses; and international business loans. In addition, it provides corporate banking products and services comprising cash management services, such as collection, liquidity management, and transfer and payment services; fixed deposit and current accounts; foreign currency and term deposits; cards; Fx, interest rate, equity, commodity, and credit derivatives; investment solutions; financial advisory services related to merger and acquisition transactions; financial advisory, underwriting, and selling agent services for products offered through the equity capital markets; and project finance advisory and feasibility study services, as well as e-banking services. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPI.F.long_name: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited
NVPI.F.summary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and treasury bills; accident, savings, health expense, cancer, heritage and life protection, income protection, travel, motor, loan protection, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory note, clean bill discount, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting service; structured and project finance; foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services; and investment solutions. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; and digital banking services. It operates through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, Shanghai, the Cayman Islands, and Myanmar, as well as through its subsidiary in Cambodia. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPJ.F.summary: TMB Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various commercial banking products and services to personal, small and medium enterprises, and corporate customers in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Commercial Banking and Retail Banking segments. It offers transactional, current accounts, savings, term deposits, time deposits, and foreign currency deposits; personal and home loans, overdraft, term loans, letter of guarantee products, and working capital facilities; and credit and business cards. The company also provides mutual funds products; security, life and health, property, and unit link insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; international trade and risk management products; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. TMB Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAK-R.BK.summary: Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited provides financial services. It offers personal loans, secured loans, nano finance under supervision, and hire purchase loans. As of December 31, 2019, it operates 441 branches and service centers. Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited is incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Uttaradit, Thailand.

In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. TFBF.F.summary: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company's personal banking products and services include savings, current, fixed deposit, and foreign currency accounts; personal, home, and auto loans; debit and credit cards; life and non-life insurance products; investment products, such as mutual funds, stocks, and derivatives/futures exchange; money transfer and bill payment, cheque and draft, and foreign exchange services; and mobile banking services. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, and special loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and import, export, and money transfer services. In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. Further, it offers auto and equipment leasing, and venture capital management services. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TGH-R.BK.long_name: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited
TGH-R.BK.summary: Thai Group Holdings Public Company Limited engages in the underwriting of life and non-life insurance business principally in Thailand. The company offers fire insurance products that provides coverage for residential and commercial properties caused by fire, gas explosion, and lighting. It also provides marine insurance products for losses or damages of shipping cargo, and/or ship vessels; domestic and international point-to-point marine, air, and land transportation; import and export protection; and other damages, including accident, explosive, vehicle damage or disappeared, and etc. The company's motor insurance offers coverage for vehicle damages, theft, fire, loss of life, and injury; and third party's vehicle damages, loss of life, and injury. In addition, it offers personal accidents, travel, cancer, accidental and property damage, burglary, all risk, plate glass, money, neon sign, contractors all risks, erection all risks, boiler & pressure vessel, electronic equipment, contractors' plant and equipment, machinery breakdown, public liability, medical malpractice liability, directors' and officers' liability, workmen's compensation, fidelity guarantee, golfer's indemnity, and other insurances. Further, the company provides auto leasing, used and new car hire purchase, cash your car, revolving loan, factoring loan, project finance, and other loans; and insurance agent training, business consulting, and property leasing, etc, as well as engages in the reinsurance business. Additionally, develops and rents real estate properties; management services; provides investing consultant and develops insurance technology. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TH-R.BK.long_name: Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited
TH-R.BK.summary: Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes newspaper in Thailand. The company also provides publishing and printing services; and short-term funds in the form of factoring, loans, and leasing services. In addition, it offers space rental for products and services business; and engages in the investment business. The company was formerly known as Tong Hua Communications Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited in May 2016. Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It also provides insurance brokerage services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Thanachart SPV1 Co., Ltd.

It also provides mutual fund, private fund, and provident fund management services; life and health insurance to individuals, institution clients, and general organizations;  fire, automobile, marine and transportation, and miscellaneous insurance products; hire purchase services for trucks, pick-up cars, taxies, and big bikes; and leasing service for cranes, fork lifts, motorcycles, excavators, etc. The company was formerly known as National Finance Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited in April 2006. Thanachart Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1959 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

THRE-R.BK.summary: Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited provides insurance and reinsurance services in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. The company offers reinsurance coverage for property, casualty, engineering, marine, and life customers. It also provides computer services in relation to motor claim management; claim management and marketing services; and actuarial, training, and advisory services, as well as insurance outsourcing and consulting services. In addition, the company develops electronic commerce services. Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

It offers ordinary, group, and credit life insurance, as well as personal accident and health reinsurance products under treaties and facultative basis. Thaire Life Assurance Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TISCO-R.BK.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
TISCO-R.BK.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as long term equity funds/retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, cancer, personal accident, car, and travel insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction services, hire purchase and retail loan, SME lending, and insurance brokerage services. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNITY-R.BK.summary: Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It also provides investment advisory, private fund asset management, and financial advisory services, as well as operates as a derivatives agent. XBLA.F.summary: Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides life insurance services to individuals and corporates in Thailand. In addition, it offers bancassurance products; equity, long term equity, mixed, foreign investment, fixed income, exchange traded, money market, local fixed income, and retirement mutual funds; and home loans, such as Bla home plans.
